AND KIND = #{kind}
AND ( TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR B.USERID LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )
AND TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND B.USERID LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY B.BOARDNO ASC
ORDER BY TITLE ASC
ORDER BY CNT DESC
